title: do you have someway or somewhere to pull up old ads?
text:
Here's a link to an online page where you can view print ads from
the StarNews:
http://starnewsonline.shopmountain.com/advertiserlist.aspx



If the ad you're looking for isn't in that list, we do keep back
issues of the paper here at the office, 1003 S. 17th St., Wilmington.
It would help to know the date the ad ran or, at least, the name of
the advertiser.
